backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister with authorization, storage mixins, and data models for glossary terms, articles, research papers, learning sections, feedback, stocks, and blogs.
feature_evidence.json: Describes feature evidence linking frontend files to implemented features, components, and tests with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of key frontend files, detailing behavior, UI features, and application logic.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md: Documentation explaining how to retry deployments and troubleshoot issues across build and deploy stages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining theme variables, dark mode values, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading fonts, favicons, and mounting the root element for the frontend app.
frontend/scripts/README.md: README describing deployment helper scripts located in the scripts directory.
frontend/scripts/retry-build-and-deploy-: Bash script automating build and deployment with logging, staged execution, and error handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with routing, theme provider, query client, lazy-loaded pages, and maintenance mode handling.
frontend/src/components/AsyncChatAssista: Lazy‑loads the chat widget after idle time or timeout, rendering it inside a Suspense boundary.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Displays the brand logo image with error handling and a text fallback when loading fails.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Cash: Renders a cash flow table with optional running balance and supports CSV export; shows an empty state when no rows exist.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Resu: Empty file placeholder for a bar chart component.
Draws a donut-style SVG pie chart showing invested vs earned values with fallback empty state handling.
frontend/src/components/ChatAssistantWid: Implements a full chat UI with intent detection, backend queries, disclaimers, and dynamic message handling.
frontend/src/components/domain/CustomDom: Empty file placeholder for a custom domain FAQ component.
Empty file placeholder for a custom domain setup guide component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a market ticker footer showing NIFTY 100 data with live/closed status and stock prices.
frontend/src/components/GlossaryBackupRe: Provides UI for exporting, validating, and restoring glossary snapshots via merge or replace modes.
frontend/src/components/GlossaryBulkImpo: Allows publishing a predefined batch of C‑terms to the glossary with confirmation and status alerts.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Creates the main site header with navigation, theming, auth handling, calculators menu, and mobile sheet.
frontend/src/components/MaintenanceScree: Shows a simple maintenance page with branding and explanatory text.
frontend/src/components/RouteLoadingFall: Displays a centered spinner and 'Loading...' text as a route-level loading fallback.
frontend/src/data/glossaryBulkImportC.ts: Provides a batch of static glossary entries for C-terms used for backend bulk import.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Builds and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook that manages client auth, identity state, and login flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for maintenance mode, admin checks, user profiles, chat, and glossary operations using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS theme tokens for light and dark modes using OKLCH values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, vision, and philosophy sections using styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Displays categorized financial articles with tab navigation and fetches data per category.
frontend/src/pages/AtalPensionYojanaCalc: Implements an APY calculator that computes pension contributions based on age and desired pension.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Shows a full blog post with metadata, tags, and error/loading states.
frontend/src/pages/BlogsPage.tsx: Lists all blogs with previews and navigation to detailed blog pages.
frontend/src/pages/CAGRCalculatorPage.ts: Interactive CAGR calculator page with input fields for initial value, final value, and years, computing and displaying the annual growth rate.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorsPage.tsx: Lists categorized financial calculators with icons and navigation links for investment, retirement, and savings tools.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact form page allowing users to submit feedback via an API and view email and Instagram contact options.
frontend/src/pages/DisclaimerPage.tsx: Displays legal disclaimers, investment risk warnings, and clarifies the site provides educational content only.
frontend/src/pages/DomainNamePage.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/EMICalculatorPage.tsx: Loan EMI calculator page that computes monthly payments, total interest, and total repayment based on user inputs.
frontend/src/pages/EPFCalculatorPage.tsx: EPF calculator page that computes employee/employer contributions, interest accrual, and maturity balance based on salary and tenure inputs.
frontend/src/pages/FDCalculatorPage.tsx: Fixed Deposit calculator supporting simple and compound interest to compute maturity amount and interest earned.
frontend/src/pages/FeedbackAdminPage.tsx: Admin interface for viewing, filtering, and sorting user feedback with authentication and access control.
frontend/src/pages/FixedVsReducingLoanCa: Compares fixed-rate and reducing-balance loan interest, calculating total repayment and differences.
frontend/src/pages/GlossaryPage.tsx: Renders a searchable glossary with grouped terms, admin diagnostics, and backup/import panels.
frontend/src/pages/GratuityCalculatorPag: Provides a gratuity calculator based on salary and years of service with eligibility logic and formatted output.
frontend/src/pages/GSTCalculatorPage.tsx: GST calculator that computes CGST, SGST, total tax, and final amount for a given base amount and GST rate.
frontend/src/pages/HomeLoanEMICalculator: Computes home loan EMI, total interest, and repayment from loan amount, rate, and tenure.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the main landing page with hero content, navigation buttons, and feature overview sections.
frontend/src/pages/HRACalculatorPage.tsx: Calculates HRA exemption and taxable components using salary, rent, DA, and city type inputs.
frontend/src/pages/LearningPage.tsx: Renders the learning sections page with topic selection, auto-scroll, and matched topic indicators using fetched sections.
frontend/src/pages/LumpSumCalculatorPage: Provides a lump sum investment calculator with compound interest, input fields, results, and cash flow breakdown.
frontend/src/pages/NPSCalculatorPage.tsx: Implements an NPS calculator computing total corpus, annuity amount, and monthly pension based on user inputs.
frontend/src/pages/NSCCalculatorPage.tsx: Calculates NSC maturity and interest using compound interest with user-provided principal, rate, and tenure.
frontend/src/pages/PPFCalculatorPage.tsx: Calculates PPF total investment, interest, and maturity value using yearly contributions and compounding logic.
frontend/src/pages/RDCalculatorPage.tsx: Provides a recurring deposit calculator with inputs for monthly investment, interest rate, and tenure, computing deposit totals and maturity value.
frontend/src/pages/RegulationsPage.tsx: Displays SEBI and RBI regulatory information, investor protection guidelines, and fraud awareness content using tabs and alerts.
frontend/src/pages/ResearchPapersPage.ts: Fetches and lists research papers with download support, showing loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/SimpleInterestCalcula: React page providing a simple interest calculator with inputs for principal, rate, and time and displaying computed interest and total amount.
frontend/src/pages/SimpleVsCompoundInter: React page comparing simple and compound interest using principal, rate, time, and compounding frequency, showing results and differences.
frontend/src/pages/SIPCalculatorPage.tsx: Implements a SIP return calculator with monthly inputs, compound growth computation, and a generated cash flow schedule.
frontend/src/pages/SSYCalculatorPage.tsx: Calculates Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana maturity values based on yearly investment, daughter's age, and fixed interest rate.
React page offering step-up SIP calculations by fixed amount or percentage, computing future value, invested amount, and returns.
frontend/src/pages/SWPCalculatorPage.tsx: Provides a Systematic Withdrawal Plan calculator that simulates monthly withdrawals, growth, and remaining balance over time.
frontend/src/pages/XIRRCalculatorPage.ts: React page allowing users to add dated cash flows and calculates XIRR using a Newton–Raphson approximation.
frontend/src/utils/arthSaathiChat.ts: Utility functions for detecting language, intent, and generating refusal messages for a finance education chat assistant.
frontend/src/utils/assetPaths.ts: Centralized utility building asset URLs using Vite base paths and exporting branded asset references.
frontend/src/utils/cashFlowSchedules.ts: Utility functions for generating cash flow schedules, labels, and running balances for calculators.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Provides CSV field escaping, array-to-CSV conversion, and a browser download helper.
frontend/src/utils/feedbackForm.ts: Defines Google Form URL utilities for opening the feedback form and generating an embed URL.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Contains number, currency, percentage, and byte-size formatting helpers using Indian conventions.
frontend/src/utils/glossaryFormatting.ts: Parses glossary definitions, normalizes terms, determines grouping keys, and resolves term references.
frontend/src/utils/glossaryKey.ts: Generates deterministic normalized keys for glossary terms and converts terms to backend-compatible keys.
frontend/src/utils/learningTopics.ts: Defines learning topic slugs and labels with helpers to lookup or match sections to topics.
frontend/src/utils/navStructure.ts: Defines the grouped site navigation structure used across desktop and mobile views.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides URL parameter parsing, session persistence, and hash cleanup utilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, existing features, and pending feature requests for the NIFTY Top 100 ticker.
